text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ أَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

translation.en: Those - their recompense will be that upon them is the curse of Allah and the angels and the people, all together
translation.id: Mereka itu, balasannya ialah ditimpa laknat Allah, para malaikat, dan manusia seluruhnya
